tutorial.title: ðŸ“– Tutorial
tutorial.whatIsSkillDesc: A skill is a preset instruction that gives an AI assistant specific capabilities. For example, a "Translation Expert" skill makes the AI better at translating, and a "Code Assistant" skill makes it better at coding.
tutorial.step1: Enable Skill â€” Toggle the switch on the right side of the skill
tutorial.step2: Bind Assistant â€” Click the ðŸ‘¥ icon on the skill, check the assistants to use it
tutorial.step3: Activate â€” In chat, click the skill tag above the input box to activate it
tutorial.advancedTip1: Click a skill card to edit its content and customize AI behavior
tutorial.advancedTip2: Click the + button in the top right to create your own skill
tutorial.advancedTip3: Support import/export to share skills with friends
tutorial.advancedTip4: Skills can be linked to MCP tool servers, auto-starting them on activation
